name: CPNavigationSession.PauseReason
desc: A set of reasons for pausing a trip.

items.name: case arrived
items.desc: The user arrived at the destination.

items.name: case loading
items.desc: The system is loading the route.

items.name: case locating
items.desc: The system is locating the destination.

items.name: case proceedToRoute
items.desc: The system is waiting for the user to proceed to the route.

items.name: case rerouting
items.desc: The system is rerouting the trip.
